sn46.13:1.1: “Suriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—arunuggam;
sn46.13:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattannam bojjhanganam uppadaya etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—yonisomanasikaro.
sn46.13:1.3: Yonisomanasikarasampannassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—satta bojjhange bhavessati, satta bojjhange bahulikarissati.
sn46.13:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.13:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn46.13:2.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.13:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
